resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106024</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106024</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208352</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Scales that aren't Major or Minor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skalen, die nicht hauptsächlich oder gering sind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échelles qui ne sont pas principales ou mineures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escalas que não são principais ou menores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scale che non sono principali o secondarie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλίμακες που δεν είναι σημαντικές ή δευτερεύουσες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escalas que no son principales o de menor 
importancia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">There are many musical scales that cannot be classified as major or minor, including chromatic, whole-tone, pentatonic, blues, and various scales common to Non-Western music.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es gibt viele musikalische Skalen, die nicht 
eingestuft werden können, wie hauptsächlich oder gering, 
einschließlich chromatisches, Vollständigton, pentatonic, Blau und 
die verschiedenen Skalen, die für Nicht-Westliche Musik geläufig 
sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il y a beaucoup d'échelles musicales qui ne 
peuvent pas être classifiées comme principales ou mineures, y 
compris chromatique, l'entier-tonalité, pentatonic, des bleus, et de 
diverses échelles communes à la musique Non-Occidentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Há muitas escalas musicais que não podem ser 
classificadas como principais ou menores, including chromatic, o 
inteiro-tom, o pentatonic, azuis, e as várias escalas comuns à 
música Non-Ocidental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ci sono molte scale musicali che non possono 
essere classificate come principali o secondarie, compreso cromatico, 
il intero-tono, pentatonic, azzurri e varie scale comuni a musica 
Non-Occidentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπάρχουν πολλές μουσικές κλίμακες που δεν μπορούν να 
ταξινομηθούν όπως σημαντικές ή δευτερεύουσες, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου χρωματικού, του ολόκληρος-τόνου, πεντάτονος, 
των μπλε, και των διάφορων κλιμάκων κοινών για την μη-δυτική 
μουσική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hay muchas escalas musicales que no se pueden 
clasificar como principales o de menor importancia, incluyendo 
cromático, entero-tono, pentatonic, los azul, y las varias escalas 
comunes a la música No-Occidental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106024</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
